hero.title: Designing & Building Creative Products
about.subtitle: About me
about.title: Need a Product? Get in Touch!
about.text: Hello, I'm Aleksandar Mladenović. I'm a student developer and I love to create beautiful and functional web applications. I enjoy turning ideas into interactive user experiences through modern tools and creative thinking. I'm always motivated to learn new technologies, explore better ways to write code and deepen my understanding of software development. Besides working on personal and academic projects, I continuously improve my skills by experimenting with APIs, frontend frameworks and real-world scenarios. I believe that consistent learning and curiosity are the keys to becoming a great developer and I'm always open to new opportunities to collaborate and grow.
skills.subtitle: My Skills
skills.title: What my Programming Skills Includes?
skills.text: I develop simple, intuitive and responsive user interface that helps user get things done with less effort and time with those technologies
projects.subtitle: My Works
projects.title: See my works
projects.text: I develop websites that make a good impression. A well-documented, clean, simple and elegant interface helps even non-technical customers. You can find all my project code on my GitHub profile
contact.subtitle: Contact
contact.title: Have you any project? Drop a message!
contact.text: Get in touch and let me know if I can help! Fill out the form and I'll be in touch as soon as possible
